title: Local Gothic
content:
Hi everyone.  
I’m considering using Christian Schwartz’s wonderful Local Gothic for a job but I nedd the client’s approval before buying it and I just can’t manage to download the specimen PDF from the Village website. Has anyone ever succeeded in doing such a thing or do I have to contact someone directly at Village to obtain it ?  
Thank you very much.

comments.content: Celese, I just checked and had the same problem with Safari on OS X 10.4.10 - I would contact Village.
No go. I think the directory has been moved/renamed, and it’s bouncing back to a defalut page.
OK — thank you both. I’ll do as you say.

They changed the foundry name from OrangeItalic to Schwartzco. You can use this link:

[http://vllg.com/images/specimens/Schwartzco/LocalGothic\_Specimen.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203175033/http:/vllg.com/images/specimens/Schwartzco/LocalGothic_Specimen.pdf "http://vllg.com/images/specimens/Schwartzco/LocalGothic\_Specimen.pdf")
